background-jobs-overview.title: Background Jobs System
background-jobs-overview.content: Automated server-side jobs that run 24/7 to monitor SLAs, send reminders, and maintain system health.

job-sla-check.title: SLA & Overdue Check
job-sla-check.content: Runs every 15 minutes to detect overdue tasks and SLA violations, automatically triggering escalation rules.

job-hearing-reminders.title: Hearing Reminders
job-hearing-reminders.content: Daily job at 8:00 AM that sends email reminders for today's and tomorrow's scheduled hearings.

job-analytics-snapshot.title: Analytics Snapshot
job-analytics-snapshot.content: Captures daily metrics at 11:59 PM for historical trend analysis and reporting dashboards.

job-deadline-alerts.title: Deadline Alerts
job-deadline-alerts.content: Morning alert at 9:00 AM for tasks and hearings due within 24 hours, helping teams prioritize work.

job-health-check.title: Automation Health Check
job-health-check.content: Daily monitoring at 7:00 AM of automation rule execution stats, alerting admins to system issues.

manual-job-trigger.title: Manual Job Execution
manual-job-trigger.content: Use 'Run Now' to manually trigger any background job for immediate execution, useful for testing or urgent updates.

job-execution-logs.title: Job Execution Logs
job-execution-logs.content: View detailed logs showing execution timestamps, status, duration, and error messages for troubleshooting.
